verses.verse: Then Nahash <S%H5176><s%> the Ammonite <S%H5984><s%> came up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against Jabeshgilead <S%H3003><s%> <S%H1568><s%>: and all the men <S%H582><s%> of Jabesh <S%H3003><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Nahash <S%H5176><s%>, Make <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8798><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with us, and we will serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee.

And Nahash <S%H5176><s%> the Ammonite <S%H5984><s%> answered <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them, On this <S%H2063><s%> condition will I make <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a covenant with you, that I may thrust out <S%H5365><s%> <S%H8800><s%> all your right <S%H3225><s%> eyes <S%H5869><s%>, and lay <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it for a reproach <S%H2781><s%> upon all Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

And the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Jabesh <S%H3003><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, Give us seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> ' respite <S%H7503><s%> <S%H8685><s%>, that we may send <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8799><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> unto all the coasts <S%H1366><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>: and then, if there be no man to save <S%H3467><s%> <S%H8688><s%> us, we will come out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to thee.

Then came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the messengers <S%H4397><s%> to Giv`ah <S%H1390><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%>, and told <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the tidings <S%H1697><s%> in the ears <S%H241><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>: and all the people <S%H5971><s%> lifted up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their voices <S%H6963><s%>, and wept <S%H1058><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And, behold, Saul <S%H7586><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the herd <S%H1241><s%> out of the field <S%H7704><s%>; and Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, What aileth the people <S%H5971><s%> that they weep <S%H1058><s%> <S%H8799><s%>? And they told <S%H5608><s%> <S%H8762><s%> him the tidings <S%H1697><s%> of the men <S%H582><s%> of Jabesh <S%H3003><s%>.

And the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> came <S%H6743><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon Saul <S%H7586><s%> when he heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8800><s%> those tidings <S%H1697><s%>, and his anger <S%H639><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> <S%H8799><s%> greatly <S%H3966><s%>.

And he took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a yoke <S%H6776><s%> of oxen <S%H1241><s%>, and hewed them in pieces <S%H5408><s%> <S%H8762><s%>, and sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8762><s%> them throughout all the coasts <S%H1366><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> by the hands <S%H3027><s%> of messengers <S%H4397><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Whosoever cometh not forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8802><s%> after <S%H310><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> and after <S%H310><s%> SH'mu'el <S%H8050><s%>, so shall it be done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8735><s%> unto his oxen <S%H1241><s%>. And the fear <S%H6343><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%> on the people <S%H5971><s%>, and they came out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with one <S%H259><s%> consent <S%H376><s%>.

And when he numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them in Bezek <S%H966><s%>, the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> were three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>, and the men <S%H376><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>.

And they said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the messengers <S%H4397><s%> that came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, Thus shall ye say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the men <S%H376><s%> of Jabeshgilead <S%H3003><s%> <S%H1568><s%>, To morrow <S%H4279><s%>, by that time the sun <S%H8121><s%> be hot <S%H2527><s%>, ye shall have help <S%H8668><s%>. And the messengers <S%H4397><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and shewed <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8686><s%> it to the men <S%H582><s%> of Jabesh <S%H3003><s%>; and they were glad <S%H8055><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

Therefore the men <S%H582><s%> of Jabesh <S%H3003><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, To morrow <S%H4279><s%> we will come out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto you, and ye shall do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with us all that seemeth <S%H5869><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> unto you.

And it was so on the morrow <S%H4283><s%>, that Saul <S%H7586><s%> put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> in three <S%H7969><s%> companies <S%H7218><s%>; and they came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the host <S%H4264><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%> watch <S%H821><s%>, and slew <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the Ammonites <S%H5983><s%> until the heat <S%H2527><s%> of the day <S%H3117><s%>: and it came to pass, that they which remained <S%H7604><s%> <S%H8737><s%> were scattered <S%H6327><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, so that two <S%H8147><s%> of them were not left <S%H7604><s%> <S%H8738><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>.

And the people <S%H5971><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto SH'mu'el <S%H8050><s%>, Who is he that said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, Shall Saul <S%H7586><s%> reign <S%H4427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> over us? bring <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the men <S%H582><s%>, that we may put them to death <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8686><s%>.

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, There shall not a man <S%H376><s%> be put to death <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8714><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%>: for to day <S%H3117><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath wrought <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> salvation <S%H8668><s%> in Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> SH'mu'el <S%H8050><s%> to the people <S%H5971><s%>, Come <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, and let us go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Gilgal <S%H1537><s%>, and renew <S%H2318><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the kingdom <S%H4410><s%> there.

And all the people <S%H5971><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Gilgal <S%H1537><s%>; and there they made Saul <S%H7586><s%> king <S%H4427><s%> <S%H8686><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> in Gilgal <S%H1537><s%>; and there they sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> <S%H8799><s%> sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of peace offerings <S%H8002><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>; and there Saul <S%H7586><s%> and all the men <S%H582><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> rejoiced <S%H8055><s%> <S%H8799><s%> greatly <S%H3966><s%>.
